scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Client,Server,Prisma" -c "yellow.bold,blue.bold,green.bold" "cd client && ng serve" "npm start --prefix server" "cd server && gulp"
scripts.deploy: yarn --cwd client build && yarn --cwd server build && yarn gcloud:activate && gcloud app deploy --quiet && gcloud app browse
scripts.deploy:function: yarn gcloud:activate && cd gcloud && gcloud beta functions deploy getZillowPropertyInfo --runtime nodejs8 --trigger-http
